case_circumstances: An employee for NV Dept of Transportation was checking all the wash areas for vagrants or any blockages when he came across the remains of a body in the wash under the on-ramp. The workers have not been in the area for almost a year.

Short brown mustache present extending to the sides of the mouth
Short brown or possibly silver beard stubble present
